description: This file contains the styles for the Tic Tac Toe web game frontend, defining layout, colors, and responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application, defining layout and text alignment.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles for the container holding the game board and status.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for the status display to show the game status.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid styles defining the layout of the Tic Tac Toe board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for each square in the Tic Tac Toe board, including hover effects and size.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the button to reset the game, including hover and active states.
